title: CLI Flags
description:
Add new flags to existing commands:
- --requires flag on create/update
- --awaiting flag on create/update
- --verdict flag on update
- --from flag on note command
- --awaiting filter on list command

These flags expose the new workflow fields through the CLI.
notes:
2026-01-14 17:58 - Completed ssq: Added --requires flag to create command. Pattern established: flag parsing with both long (--requires) and short (-r) forms, validation against tick.RequiresApproval/RequiresReview/RequiresContent constants before tick creation, optional *string field set only when value provided. This pattern can be reused for --requires and --awaiting on update command.
2026-01-14 18:01 - Completed rto: Added --requires/-r flag to update command. Same optionalString pattern as create, but with empty-to-clear behavior (like defer flag). Key difference from create: update uses optionalString with explicit set flag check, allowing empty values to clear the field. Tests added for all enum values, clearing, invalid values, and short flag.
